single_crochet = single_crochet 2 75 mm c crochet hook increase = increase stuffing decrease = decrease scissors slip_stitch = slip_stitch yarn needle skip = skip blo = back loop only flo = front loop only f/o = finish off x = repeat x = total number of stitches information contact size tall long ravelry icrochetthings 2 3 etsy icrochetthings tumblr i-crochet-things copyright © 2025 icrochetthings 3/5 body -begin with medium blue -stuff as you go 1 work 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 2 increase around 12 3 single_crochet increase around 18 4 single_crochet increase single_crochet around 24 5 3 single_crochet increase four times 8 single_crochet 28 6 single_crochet around 28 7 2 single_crochet increase 2 single_crochet four times 8 single_crochet 32 8 single_crochet around 32 9 5 single_crochet increase four times 8 single_crochet 36 10 11 single_crochet around 36 12 blo- slip_stitch around 36 -the unused front loops from round 11 will be used later to make the lines on the body 13 15 single_crochet around 36 16 blo- slip_stitch around 36 -the unused front loops from round 15 will be used later to make the lines on the body 17 single_crochet around 36 18 5 single_crochet decrease four times 8 single_crochet 32 19 single_crochet around 32 20 blo- slip_stitch around 32 -the unused front loops from round 19 will be used later to make the lines on the body 21 2 single_crochet decrease 2 single_crochet four times 8 single_crochet 28 22 single_crochet around 28 23 3 single_crochet decrease four times 8 single_crochet 24 24 single_crochet decrease single_crochet around 18 25 single_crochet decrease around 12 26 decrease around 6 -f/o sew shut copyright © 2025 icrochetthings 4/5 body lines -before each line make a slip knot with dark blue yarn and slide it onto the hook starting in the first unused front loop from round 11 of the body 12 28 flo- slip_stitch leave remaining 8 stitches unworked 28 -f/o weave in loose ends starting in the first unused front loop from round 15 of the body 16 28 flo- slip_stitch leave remaining 8 stitches unworked 28 -f/o weave in loose ends starting in the first unused front loop from round 19 of the body 20 24 flo- slip_stitch leave remaining 8 stitches unworked 24 -f/o weave in loose ends legs x 6 -begin with medium blue 1 work 5 single_crochet in a magic_ring 5 2 3 single_crochet around 5 -f/o leave long tail for sewing antennae x 2 -begin with medium blue 1 chain 5 skip 1st chain slip_stitch across 4 -f/o leave long tail for sewing eyes x 2 -begin
